author: Staff Reporter
text:
A junior assistant at the Assistant Elementary Education (AEE) office at Thalaivasal was arrested on charges of preparing fake transfer certificate in 2015.

Applicants

Rajendran was the Regional Transport Officer in Attur in 2015 and the office had received applications for issue of heavy duty vehicle licence. Many applicants submitted the school transfer certificate with Class VIII as their qualification.

He suspected that the certificates are fake and forwarded it to the District Educational Officer seeking its genuineness.

Three certificates are found to be fake and a complaint was lodged with the District Crime Branch.

A special team led by Sub-Inspector Sundarambal conducted inquiries and found R. Karthikeyan (35), the then office assistant at Government Higher Secondary School in Panaimadal to have issued the fake certificates.

Presently, he was working in the AEE office in Thalaivasal.

The team arrested him and produced in court at Attur and lodged at Attur sub-jail. Inquiry is on to ascertain whether fake certificates were received by many people.
title: Arrested in fake certificate racket
